original_title: 『お父さん、エッチってなに？』と無邪気な娘の質問に、俺は真面目に答えようと奮起しすぎて勃起。それを興味津々で弄り倒す娘にたまらず射精したら、おいしそうにゴックンまでされてしまった件。
overview: I don't want to imagine it too much, but my daughter is a type that is popular with men. One day, I come to my room and ask about sex. How to kiss, how to blow, how to cunnilingus and fucking, and how to masturbate ... I explained as much knowledge as I know, but he said "demonstrate" so'for my daughter's future! I thought, "I took it off and gave a lecture, but on the contrary, she was easily pulled out and swallowed ...
tagline: And When She Curiously Started Playing with It, I Couldn't Hold Back, and Ejaculated, and Then She Began to Deliciously Suck It All Down.
title: 'Hey Stepdaddy, What's Sex All About?' It Was an Innocent Question, and I Wanted to Give Her A Serious Answer, So I Got an Excessively Serious Erection.
